text: Night of Champions (2014) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view and livestreaming show made by WWE. It took place on September 21, 2014 at the Bridgestone Arena in Nashville, Tennessee. It was the eighth Night of Champions event held by WWE and the first to stream live on the WWE Network. The main event saw John Cena defeat Brock Lesnar by disqualification after Seth Rollins interfered. This caused Lesnar to keep his WWE World Heavyweight Championship. ==Results== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Night of Champions 2014 website Category:2014 in professional wrestling Category:2010s in Nashville, Tennessee Category:WWE Night of Champions Category:2014 in the United States Category:September 2014 events
title: Night of Champions (2014)
